paragraph: Karl Zaruba (December 29, 1902 – October 5, 1978 ) was an Austrian composer and conductor, founder of the Neue Meister Deutsch Kapelle (Neue Deutschmeister Band). He was the conductor of the Austrian Folk Musicians and director of the Schuhplattler Dance Band
The Merry Yodeler, Volume II (Musical LP, 1953, director)
Folk Dances of Austria, Vol. 3: Traditional Schuhplattler Dances, (LP 1962, director)
The Neue Deutschmeister Band in Stereo (Neue Deutschmeister Band, Elektra EKS 7101 (Stereo), Released: 1958, conductor)
